# [Interview #1155: Calamity-Philadelphia, PA, Entry #69](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1155#69)

#### Question

How much of Newcago would a Coinshot have to eat to Push it?

#### Brandon Sanderson

A lot.
